1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin rey, yab'ocab' Jehová co Diosal a on̈ yin̈til on̈ vin̈aj Jacob a lesalvi. Aocab' tzach colani ayic ayach och d'a ilc'olal.</t>
2: <t>Yac'ocab'cot scolval d'ayach masanto d'a stemplo d'a Sion.</t>
3: <t>Snaocab'cot masanil ofrenda ix ac'a'. Schaocab' sc'ool a silab' tza n̈ustz'aoc.</t>
4: <t>Aocab' ol ac'an elc'och icha a gana yed' masanil tastac nab'il uuj.</t>
5: <t>Ol el cav yuj tzalajc'olal ayic ol ac'an ganar eb' ajc'ool. Ol quic'chaan̈ co bandera yuj quic'anchaan̈ co Diosal. Aocab' Jehová tz'ac'an masanil tas c'anb'il uuj.</t>
6: <t>Cojtacxo ticnaic to a Jehová ol colan vin̈ co reyal sic'b'ilel yuuj. Masanto d'a satchaan̈ to an̈ej ay yico', ol tac'voccot d'ay. Yuj spoder Jehová chi' ol yac' ganar nivac oval vin̈ co reyal.</t>
7: <t>Ay eb' tz'ac'anoch scarruaje yic oval yipoc sc'ool, ay pax juntzan̈xo eb', a noc' schej eb' syac'och yipoc sc'ool. A on̈xo pax tic, a Jehová co Diosal scac'och yipoc co c'ool.</t>
8: <t>A eb' chi' spax yip yoc eb', stelvi eb', a on̈xo pax tic jun, tec'tec' caji, lin̈ann̈ej on̈ q'uei.</t>
9: <t>Mamin Jehová, col vin̈ co reyal. Tac'van̈ d'ayon̈ ayic tzach cavtani.</t>
